product_name: Mountain Hardwear Refueler 2-in-1 Shorts - Men's 9" Inseam
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Refueler 2-in-1 shorts help you charge through your workout with 4-way stretch and lightweight fabric. Stretch-woven polyester fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and feels like a soft breeze over your skin. Fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off fabric. Fabric protects skin from harmful UV light with a UPF rating of 25. Liner soaks up moisture like a sponge and pulls it away from skin. Soft drawcord at waist ensures a comfortable fit. Side pockets shelter hands and an internal pocket stores a key. Reflective highlights and reflective print increase visibility in low light. Mountain Hardwear Refueler 2-in-1 shorts are semifitted.
